bioAsHtml: My name is Tom Michiels. I'm a enterprise architect taking my first steps in DataScience. I want to create IT architectures ready for the future. A future where the ability to adapt is going to be the difference between live and death. I'm convinced that validated learning is going to be a key differentiator and stream based architectures are going to be of increased importance. For too long there was a big focus on facts it is time for focus on state transition.
